SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT ,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT"C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT,
CASE
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 ) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 ) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM QNABOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
